mapper.select: select count(*) from (select * from order_code, order_list where order_code.no = order_list.no and order_code.status='주문 완료') as totalcnt

select * from (select * from order_code, order_list where order_code.no = order_list.no) as total where store_name=#{store_name} and order_time >= current_date and order_time < current_date + integer '1' ORDER BY order_time DESC limit #{listSize} offset #{startList}

select count(*) from (select * from order_code, order_list where order_code.no = order_list.no) as total where store_name=#{store_name} and order_time >= current_date and order_time < current_date + integer '1'
mapper.update: update order_code set payment_status = 'true' where no=#{no}
update order_code set status = #{status} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select * from order_code, order_list where order_code.no = order_list.no and order_code.no = #{no}
select menu_type, count(*) from (select * from order_code, order_list where order_code.no = order_list.no and order_code.store_name=#{store_name}) as total group by menu_type
SELECT date(order_time), SUM(total_price) as total, avg(total_price) as average FROM order_code where store_name=#{store_name} group by date(order_time) order by date(order_time)
select count(*) from (select * from order_code, order_list where order_code.no = order_list.no and order_code.store_name=#{store_name}) as total
